descriptionHtml:
Includes a few rugs and tapestries I've made for my upcoming castle mod which can be found [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/2995359-wip-castle-faolan/]here[/url]. I'll add more models and textures to the pack as I go.

Now includes 10 rugs and 16 tapestries. 

Feel free to upload (appropriate) pictures of these in your mods so people can see what they look like in game..because i'm to lazy to do it myself.



As always if you encounter any issues with anything in this pack contact my supervisor, and we will resolve you issue in an almost certainly unsatisfactory manner in a few months. :)
author: Tlaffoon
